page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOOVER A hoover works by electricity. You plug the hoover in. There is a switch on the plug and one on the hoover. It makes a very loud noise when you switch it on. It sucks up all the dust. The hoover has a big bag. When it gets full up it makes a funny noise. {SEWING MACHINE A sewing machine has a needle to sew things together.At the end of the machine it has a wheel.It has a body that sits on a small box.If you turn the wheel the needle bobs up and down and it sews. {IRONING After the clothes are dry you take then inside to iron them. The iron has holes in the bottom of it where steam comes out if you want it to the iron removes all the creases from clothes.
